column5: We have been to Vista Lake two years and the fishing is very good, the cabins great and private (miles apart as it is boat in) and the service wonderful. Wondering if anyone else has been to Vista Lake and taken advantage of the boats available for portage into several small lakes and if the fishing is dramatically better. Is the effort worth it?
Hey Davis, I was thinking about going to Vista lake next year. How was the walleye fishing? What cabin did you stay at? Let me know when you get a chance.Cheers.
